resources.string: Hi!, My name is Nur Hikmah, you can call me Hikma, Imma or Mima. I was born in Pinrang 12 Desember 2003. I used to live in Pinrang, but now I live in Makassar because I continue my study in Hasanuddin University. I like spicy food but sometimes I also want to eat sweetmeat but I dont really like it because it makes me sick.
